channel.title: L33T Pkz Scape! V1.0
channel.description:
L33T Pkz Scape V1.0!
My first server to be downloaded but 2nd ever created!
Please look into it, even if it's not something ur interested in... just gif rep or tell me what i could fix!
Thanks!!
A Call Out For Rep!
Myself: 90% Figment: 10% - For Shops
http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?m3qnj4mzi2j
Pics:
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/L33tPkz1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/L33tpkz2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/L33tpkz3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/l33tpkz4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/L33tpkz7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/l33tpkz8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/Leetpkz5.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/L33tpkz9.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/L33tpkz10.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i148.photobucket.com/albums/s30/Bradyfan234/Leetpkz6.jpg[/img]
Updates to be made (Up to V2.0) :
Moving Shops Putting Items in Different Shops (V1.1) More NPCs for training (V1.2) Adding More Drops for NPCs (V1.3) Fully working 1v1 (V1.4) Custom Client + Items (V1.5) D Claws, Vestas, Statius, Full Specs + Mage and Range Working void and lunar (V2.0)

[quote=“Mod Rancid, post:3, topic:281090”]dude, portals n shit might be similar… that doesn’t mean its a copied source…

i’d say at least 89% is custom[/quote]

But it’s still Figment. Lol. If your going to post a source, make your coding meaningful?
